dict.acceptation: 红色的；（脸）涨红的；烧红的；红头发的；
红色；红衣服；红颜料；红葡萄酒；

sent.orig: This paper proposes a novel RED algorithm based on multiple priorities namely Preferential Dynamic Threshold-RED(PDT-RED) .
sent.trans: 提出一种基于多优先级的动态阈值RED算法(PDT-RED)。

sent.orig: They are called Red-Letter Days because in early printed calendars they were marked in red ink.
sent.trans: 吉利日之所以叫做Red－LetterDay,是因为这些日子在早期印刷的日历中都印成红色的缘故。

sent.orig: RED can greatly alleviate the congestion status of networks.
sent.trans: RED可以在很大程度上改善网络中的拥塞状况。

sent.orig: EP-RED is complete iron control system for oil well acidizing.
sent.trans: RED是一套完整的铁质控制系统用于油井酸处理。

sent.orig: One AQM, the so-called random early detection (RED) has been recommended by the IETF.
sent.trans: 在主动队列管理算法当中，随机早期检测(RED)已经被IETF推荐作为基于路由器的拥塞控制机制。
